author: Rik
post_text: October 10, 2021 at 9:39 PM#1Hi,I want to make a flash button to temporarily double the speed of the speedmaster.Does someone know how I can make this?Thanks in advance,LD-RV

posts.author: Rik
posts.post_text: October 10, 2021 at 9:39 PM#1Hi,I want to make a flash button to temporarily double the speed of the speedmaster.Does someone know how I can make this?Thanks in advance,LD-RV

posts.author: scoobytoobins
posts.post_text: October 13, 2021 at 3:21 PM#2Would probably do it as a DMX remote where one fixture at 100 sends the CMD to doublespeed, and one fixture at 0 sends the CMD to halfspeed. Store them both at full on a flash button.

title: Flash DoubleSpeed speedmaster
